content: bold is beautiful in this striking crochet bag that s sure to get noticed stitched in a rich shade of red heart granny square all in one the yarn changes colors for you to effortlessly create perfect granny squares simply join motifs together then make your strap using simple single_crochet measuring 16 x 16 it s got lots of space for your project work or for toting around your daily essentials red heart® all in one™ granny square™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m moody cherry 2019 1 ball 13 granny squares approx 16 40 5 cm wide x 16 40 5 cm deep excluding strap
